name: Calamity Condition
description:
It's time for the invisible pandemic... Calamity Condition is a short bullet hell game where you play as a time slowing eyeball trying to discover the reason for your existence.

Follow Our Team:
Game Designer, Artist: Aria Mohebi
Programmer: Benjamin Greenhalgh
Sound Designer: Alex Castonguay
Sound Designer, Composer: Aidan Lytton
Thumbnail Art: Francisca Chonlong
Poem: Amy West
